title: LOL Installer Not Open. URGENT RIOT reply PLZ
body:
Hello riot and fellow LOL players. I used to play LOl but I decided that i would take a break. So i uninstalled it from my computer and a 2 weeks later i decided to start playing again so I downloaded it and no problem what so ever . after a while in one of my games the computer shut off and would continously restart it self so I restarted the system and couldnt open my LOL. It kept sending the message to me: "This application has failed to start because the application configuration is incorrect. Reinstalling it may fix the problem. So I deleted it and tried to re install but when i click the link and come into my downloads and i click it again it wont open like i never touched it. So i used some info from this forum but the launcher wouldnt open it would send me the same message. I already tried to sys recovery it stays the same
So PLZ anyone out there PLZZZ help me I have tried for days without no avail. PLZ help me so i can continue with LOL

replies.body:
It sounds like your installation of League may be completely borked. I recommend grabbing our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and completing a clean reinstall of League. After installing the application, simply run it, check the boxes for both **Reinstall** and **clean uninstall** and let it run. After it's finished, right click on the League Icon and select **run as administrator** and let the patching process finish. 

Let me know if this helped.

Hi Targons Blade thanks for replying. But when I try to open the Hextech repair tool after installation it say "The procedure entry point GetLogicalProccesorInformation  could not be located in the dynamic link library KERNEL32.dll." I hope you reply soon ty{{champion:86}}

It sounds like there are some rather nasty problems going on with either your drivers or your Windows installation that are causing this. I recommend running a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attaching them to a [support ticket submission](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Our tech team will be able to dive into those logs and figure out exactly what's going on.

Let me know if you have any questions.
The hextech repair tool doesent even open

You can instead run a [dxdiag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5) and a [process list](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3), then attach them to your submission.

ah hello  i know this aint the place to put a ticket but u know my situation so its easier.  Back when my computer workedd and i played it shut off a few times in mid games so i got put in lower queue and i was wondering if u cold take it off
